title: Mike's sweet chilli sauce
ingredients: ['115g granulated sugar', "2 bird's-eye chillies, finely chopped", '1/4 red pepper, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon red chilli flakes (optional)', '3 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '50ml rice or cider vinegar', '200ml water', '1 1/2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with a little water']
